de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.color

Class FeatureColorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.color.FeatureColorManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventListener

    public class FeatureColorManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEventListener
    Manages colors assigned to features.
    Author:
    Jens Meinicke, Marcus Pinnecke (Feature Interface)
